body_html:
An error message "configure: line xyz: type: ldconfig: not found" is printed on stderr if the command is not found in the line starting with "if ! type ldconfig".

There's a simple solution but as I cannot sign the CLA at this time, I cannot submit it. Hint: 5 characters.

I can confirm, however, that the variable LDCONFIG_BIN is initialised as intended to "/sbin/ldconfig" for my login without ldconfig in PATH.

Tested on openSUSE Leap 42.2.

body:
An error message "configure: line xyz: type: ldconfig: not found" is printed on stderr if the command is not found in the line starting with "if ! type ldconfig".

There's a simple solution but as I cannot sign the CLA at this time, I cannot submit it. Hint: 5 characters.

I can confirm, however, that the variable LDCONFIG_BIN is initialised as intended to "/sbin/ldconfig" for my login without ldconfig in PATH.

Tested on openSUSE Leap 42.2.
